entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
